Title: Memoir of War
Writer: Marguerite Duras (novel), Emmanuel Finkiel (adaptation), Emmanuel Finkiel (screenplay)
Actors: Mélanie Thierry, Benoît Magimel, Benjamin Biolay, Grégoire Leprince-Ringuet
Plot: Marguerite must navigate through the hardships of the Liberation after losing her husband and starting a relationship with the enemy during the War.
